citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:48AM on
January 14, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by phone. Upon arrival, the licensee was contacted by
phone, stating they were out of town for work. No one would be available for an inspection on today, as the licensee does
not have an alternative facility representative to conduct the inspection with the inspector.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:48AM on 
January 14, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by phone. Upon arrival, the licensee was contacted by 
phone, stating they were out of town for work. No one would be available for an inspection on today, as the licensee does 
not have an alternative facility representative to conduct the inspection with the inspector. 
 
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
